explains: adv. 精神上，智力上，思想上
wordGroup: mentally retarded 智障；智力迟钝
mentally handicapped 智力障碍的；精神障碍的

sentences.en: Mentally, she is not very stable.
sentences.cn: 她的心理状态不十分稳定。

sentences.en: He was found to be mentally unfit to stand trial.
sentences.cn: 发现他精神状况不适合接受审判。

sentences.en: You may be physically and mentally exhausted after a long flight.
sentences.cn: 长途飞行后你可能身心都很疲惫。
